org.mindswap.owls.grounding
Interface UPnPGroundingProvider

All Superinterfaces:
OWLObjectConverterProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
UPnPGroundingProviderImpl
public interface UPnPGroundingProvider
extends OWLObjectConverterProvider

Factory like encapsulation of methods that need to be implemented in order to provide a UPnP grounding implementation.

The methods defined here directly correspond and are used by the methods provided by UPnPGroundingFactory.
